downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Guide: Business Portal Administrator's Guide
downloadDescription: This guide includes information for administrators who set up and provide access to Business Portal 6.0 or 6.1, manage its daily use, create back office queries, and generate reports.
detailsSection: This guide also describes the Business Data Catalog and includes reference information about users and roles.
systemRequirementsSection: To view the PDF files, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download the file to your computer.
